title: TikToker Lands the Role of a Lifetime: Playing Dead on TV
description: Every day for nearly a year, Josh Nalley posted TikToks of himself playing dead in the hopes of being cast in a television series or movie. Then “CSI: Vegas” reached out.
dc:creator: Remy Tumin
media:description: Lawrence Mercado, a special effects artist, with Josh Nalley, who was playing a corpse on the set of “CSI: Vegas.”
